roleset.name: to cut grass or grain
roleset.note: MOW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mow' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from mow.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: mow-v: transitive
example.text: Bailiffs claimed [0] they-1 were required [*-1]to chauffeur him to and from work , mow his lawn , chop his wood , fix his car and even drop by his house [*-2] to feed his two grown mutts , Dixie and Husky .

roleset.name: take out everything in ones path, like with a car or weapon
roleset.note: MOW_DOWN-V NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: mow_down-v
example.text: `` We mowed down '' the attackers , said Lt. Col. B.P. McCoy .

example.name: mow_down-v
example.text: We-1 let them come to 100 yards of our parapet and then *-1 mowed them down with our machineguns and rifles.
